lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The banker said officials have stressed repeatedly over the past six weeks that China's foreign borrowing will not be affected by a drive against "bourgeois liberalism," a phrase meaning Western political ideas, following the dismissal of Communist Party chief Hu Yaobang on January 16.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The dilemma for China, in foreign borrowing as in other areas, is to balance central control with giving reasonable autonomy to firms.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Interest rates in Japan are at a historical low, but China, which will remain an active borrower this year, is likely to go elsewhere for capital, to get a better currency spread," he said.
